name: part_003
file: tmp_【 #夏色まつり誕生祭2025 】重大告知あり！アイドル革命進行中！～今日の主役は夢の途中～　【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [L-XVS13TRTI]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Natsuiro Matsuri speaking to the audience during the MC segment.
Performance of the song 'Sakura Apparition' by Natsuiro Matsuri and guests.

subtitles.original: え ダンスとかがすごく大好きなので
subtitles.english: I really love dancing, so...

subtitles.original: あの レッスンでね
subtitles.english: during the lessons,

subtitles.original: 「お願い やらせてください」って言って
subtitles.english: I begged them, "Please let me do this,"

subtitles.original: フォーメーションとかもね 含め
subtitles.english: and including the formations and such,

subtitles.original: みんなには頑張ってもらっていますので
subtitles.english: everyone has been working really hard on it,

subtitles.original: あの 君の推しがもしいたら褒めてあげてください
subtitles.english: so if your favorite is here, please praise them.

subtitles.original: ということで
subtitles.english: So with that said,

subtitles.original: え ゲストパート準備してきちゃいますね
subtitles.english: I'm going to go get ready for the guest part.

subtitles.original: じゃあみんな「わくわく」ってコメントして待ってて
subtitles.english: Everyone, comment "waku waku" and wait for me.

subtitles.original: じゃあ行ってきまーす
subtitles.english: Okay, I'm off!

subtitles.original: わくわく！
subtitles.english: Waku waku!

subtitles.original: わくわく！
subtitles.english: Waku waku!

subtitles.original: わーくわくわくわくわくわく
subtitles.english: Waaaku waku waku waku waku...

subtitles.original: Hello P.M.P from Akihabara to everywhere
subtitles.english: Hello P.M.P from Akihabara to everywhere

subtitles.original: さそ寄ってらっしゃい見てらっしゃい も一切合切やっちゃいな
subtitles.english: Come on over, take a look! Let's do it all!

subtitles.original: 有竹の渇いた楽しいこと詰め込んで
subtitles.english: Pack in all the thirsty fun things we have!

subtitles.original: 妄想挿入 船に乗っていざ出航だ
subtitles.english: Insert delusions, board the ship, and set sail!

subtitles.original: Hello P.N.P from Japanese hot area
subtitles.english: Hello P.N.P from Japanese hot area

subtitles.original: みんな元気でカッコつけて
subtitles.english: Everyone, look lively and act cool!

subtitles.original: はい 電波！
subtitles.english: Yes, Dempa!

subtitles.original: 電波！
subtitles.english: Dempa!

subtitles.original: ありがサンキュー 準備はバッチリのようだね
subtitles.english: Thanks, thank you! Looks like preparations are perfect.

subtitles.original: 今からでっかい船に乗っていざ出航だ
subtitles.english: Now we board a huge ship and set sail!

subtitles.original: さあみんな DANCE DANCE DANCE
subtitles.english: Come on everyone, DANCE DANCE DANCE!

subtitles.original: さらし巻いてビラがヒラリ
subtitles.english: Wrap the sarashi, flyers flutter down.

subtitles.original: カッコつけてもパッパッパとはみ出てる
subtitles.english: Even if we act cool, it sticks out pa-pa-pa!

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃなときめいたり
subtitles.english: Chaotically heart-throbbing,

subtitles.original: それが僕らにとってのファンタジー
subtitles.english: that is our fantasy.

subtitles.original: シュントシュント感じるんだ呼んでるんだ
subtitles.english: Feeling it sharply, it's calling us!

subtitles.original: ソレソレソレソレ
subtitles.english: Sore sore sore sore!

subtitles.original: SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE
subtitles.english: SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE

subtitles.original: 腕を振っては汗タラリ
subtitles.english: Wave your arms, sweat dripping down.

subtitles.original: ずっとしてもコチコチコチ逆方向
subtitles.english: Even if you stay still, tick-tock, opposite way.

subtitles.original: 青春はそれでいいのだ
subtitles.english: That's perfectly fine for youth!

subtitles.original: 勘違いも味方にしちゃうのだ
subtitles.english: Make misunderstandings your ally too!

subtitles.original: 森羅万象 歌えニッポン 踊れニッポン
subtitles.english: All creation! Sing Japan! Dance Japan!

subtitles.original: あ ソレソレソレソレ！
subtitles.english: Ah, sore sore sore sore!

subtitles.original: チントンシャント どこまでも
subtitles.english: Chin-ton-shan, on and on forever.

subtitles.original: ほら パワフル全開で突き抜けろ
subtitles.english: Look, break through with full power!

subtitles.original: あっちもこっちもそっちも祭りだワッショイ
subtitles.english: Here, there, and everywhere, it's a festival! Wasshoi!

subtitles.original: アッパレアッパレ アドベンチャー
subtitles.english: Bravo, bravo adventure!

subtitles.original: 大和撫子へ任せ
subtitles.english: Leave it to the Yamato Nadeshiko,

subtitles.original: 不思議な言霊 奇想天外さ いつまでも
subtitles.english: mysterious spirit of words, unpredictable forever!

subtitles.original: 神様仏様うさぎ様
subtitles.english: God, Buddha, Rabbit-sama!

subtitles.original: 月に祈って拝んで君思って
subtitles.english: Pray to the moon, worship, thinking of you.

subtitles.original: 半端な気持ちを断ち切って
subtitles.english: Cut off those half-hearted feelings!

subtitles.original: とりあえずいっか 黙ってついてこい
subtitles.english: Whatever, just shut up and follow me!

subtitles.original: Follow Me!
subtitles.english: Follow Me!

subtitles.original: ああ…
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 君の未来を明るく照らすなんて
subtitles.english: To light up your future brightly,

subtitles.original: お茶の子さいさいさい
subtitles.english: is a piece of cake, sai sai sai!

subtitles.original: 百花繚乱 大和撫子たちよ
subtitles.english: Profusion of flowers, oh Yamato Nadeshikos!

subtitles.original: どでかい花火を上げましょね
subtitles.english: Let's launch some huge fireworks!

subtitles.original: ほら踊る阿呆に見る阿呆
subtitles.english: Look, a dancing fool and a watching fool.

subtitles.original: 同じ阿呆なら踊らにゃ損損損
subtitles.english: If we're both fools, you lose if you don't dance!

subtitles.original: さあみんな DANCE DANCE DANCE
subtitles.english: Come on everyone, DANCE DANCE DANCE!

subtitles.original: さらし巻いておへそチラリ
subtitles.english: Wrap the sarashi, glimpse of a belly button.

subtitles.original: 靴脱いだらソコソコソコ破れてる
subtitles.english: Took off my shoes and the bottom is torn!

subtitles.original: ドタバタなこのステージ
subtitles.english: This slapstick stage,

subtitles.original: これが私にとっての政治
subtitles.english: this is politics to me!

subtitles.original: 妄想創造 羽ばたくんだ聞こえるんだ
subtitles.english: Delusion, creation, taking flight, I can hear it!

subtitles.original: ソレソレソレソレ
subtitles.english: Sore sore sore sore!

subtitles.original: SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE
subtitles.english: SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE

subtitles.original: 腕を振っては涙キラリ
subtitles.english: Wave your arms, tears twinkle.

subtitles.original: 強がってもキュンキュンキュン苦しいの
subtitles.english: Even acting tough, my heart throbs, it hurts!

subtitles.original: 乙女はそれでいいのだ
subtitles.english: That's perfectly fine for a maiden!

subtitles.original: マイナスも味方にしちゃうのだ
subtitles.english: Make the negatives your ally too!

subtitles.original: チョイとそこ愛してんだみんな大好き
subtitles.english: Hey you there, I love you! I love everyone!

subtitles.original: ダダダダダダダ
subtitles.english: Da da da da da da da

subtitles.original: Break down!
subtitles.english: Break down!

subtitles.original: チントンシャント どこまでも
subtitles.english: Chin-ton-shan, on and on forever.

subtitles.original: ほら パワフル全開で突き抜けろ
subtitles.english: Look, break through with full power!

subtitles.original: あっちもこっちもそっちも祭りだワッショイ
subtitles.english: Here, there, and everywhere, it's a festival! Wasshoi!

subtitles.original: アッパレアッパレ アドベンチャー
subtitles.english: Bravo, bravo adventure!

subtitles.original: 大和撫子へ任せ
subtitles.english: Leave it to the Yamato Nadeshiko,

subtitles.original: 不思議な言霊 奇想天外さ いつまでも
subtitles.english: mysterious spirit of words, unpredictable forever!

subtitles.original: 神様仏様うさぎ様
subtitles.english: God, Buddha, Rabbit-sama!

subtitles.original: 月に祈って拝んで君思って
subtitles.english: Pray to the moon, worship, thinking of you.

subtitles.original: 半端な気持ちを断ち切って
subtitles.english: Cut off those half-hearted feelings!

subtitles.original: とりあえずいっか 黙ってついてこい
subtitles.english: Whatever, just shut up and follow me!

subtitles.original: Follow Me!
subtitles.english: Follow Me!

subtitles.original: ああ…
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 君の未来を明るく照らすなんて
subtitles.english: To light up your future brightly,

subtitles.original: お茶の子さいさいさい
subtitles.english: is a piece of cake, sai sai sai!

subtitles.original: 満月の下で踊りましょ
subtitles.english: Let's dance under the full moon!

subtitles.original: 桜舞い散る季節を歌いましょ
subtitles.english: Let's sing of the season where cherry blossoms flutter!

subtitles.original: 君といつかまた出会うその日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day I meet you again someday!

subtitles.original: 忘れない 忘れないで
subtitles.english: I won't forget, don't you forget!

subtitles.original: バイバイさようなら
subtitles.english: Bye bye, sayonara!
